name: Dance
description: Explore the rhythm of life through dance. Join us for electrifying performances, workshops, and events that will make your heart beat to the music of motion.

events.name: Footloose
events.description: Feel the heat with our Salsa Night! An evening filled with passionate moves, lively music, and the joy of dancing.

events.name: Naach
events.description: Witness the grace and beauty of ballet in our exclusive showcase. A mesmerizing blend of artistry and athleticism.

events.name: Showdown
events.description: Get ready to groove at our Hip-Hop Jam! A celebration of urban dance culture with beats that will make you move.

name: Music
description: Immerse yourself in the world of music. From soulful melodies to heart-pounding beats, our events cater to every music enthusiast.

events.name: Raaga & Rhapsody
events.description: Experience the magic of jazz at our Jazz Festival. A night filled with smooth tunes, improvisation, and soulful performances.

events.name: Battle Of Bands
events.description: Let the adrenaline rush with our Rock Concert! An electrifying showcase of powerful vocals and rocking guitar solos.

events.name: Rap Showdown
events.description: Indulge in the elegance of classical music at our Classical Soiree. An evening of symphonies and timeless compositions.

name: Theatre
description: Step into the world of drama and storytelling. Our theatrical events promise captivating performances that will leave you spellbound.

events.name: Stage Play
events.description: Immerse yourself in the world of stage plays. A theatrical experience that brings stories to life on a captivating stage.

events.name: Nukkad Natak
events.description: Experience the raw energy of street theatre with Nukkad Natak. Stories unfold in the midst of the audience, creating a vibrant and interactive atmosphere.

events.name: Mime out loud
events.description: Step into the silent world of expressive mime. A unique form of theatrical art that communicates without words, yet speaks volumes.

events.name: MonoAct
events.description: Witness the power of a single performer in MonoAct. A solo act that weaves a compelling narrative and showcases the versatility of a lone artist.

name: Fashion
description: Discover a curated selection of products and experiences that enhance your lifestyle. From fashion to travel, find inspiration for a life well-lived.

events.name: Rampage
events.description: Immerse yourself in the world of style at our Fashion Expo. Explore the latest trends, designs, and glamorous runway showcases.

name: Photo and Art
description: Immerse yourself in the world of visual arts. Explore stunning photography and captivating artworks that tell stories and evoke emotions.

events.name: Concieve
events.description: Hone your photography skills in our exclusive Masterclass. Learn from renowned photographers and capture the essence of visual storytelling.

events.name: Stroke Of Genius
events.description: Witness the unveiling of exquisite artworks at our Art Gallery Opening. Immerse yourself in a world of creativity and expression.

name: Fun
description: Connect with a global community through online experiences. From virtual events to digital content, explore the limitless possibilities of the online world.

events.name: Battledrome
events.description: Immerse yourself in the magic of music with our Virtual Concert. Experience live performances from talented artists in the comfort of your own space.

events.name: Hunger Hikes
events.description: Expand your knowledge through our Webinar Series. Engage with experts and thought leaders on a variety of topics shaping the online landscape.

events.name: Crimes & Clues
events.description: Explore groundbreaking digital art in our Digital Art Exhibition. Witness the convergence of technology and creativity in the digital realm.

events.name: Open Mic
events.description: Join the excitement of our Online Gaming Tournament. Compete with players worldwide and prove your skills in the virtual gaming arena.

name: Technical
description: Experience the excitement of cutting-edge technology and innovation in our CEP (Consumer Electronics and Photography) category. Stay ahead with the latest gadgets and trends.

events.name: Code Mutants
events.description: Stay on the forefront of technology with our Tech Symposium. Explore the latest innovations, hear from industry experts, and glimpse into the future of consumer electronics.

events.name: Tech Hunt
events.description: Capture the perfect shot with our Photography Workshop. Learn essential skills and techniques to elevate your photography game.

events.name: Anweshan
events.description: Get hands-on with the latest gadgets at our Gadget Expo. Experience the future of consumer electronics with live demonstrations and interactive displays.

name: Informal Events
description: Embrace the spirit of joy and laughter in our Fun category. Discover entertaining activities, games, and events that bring smiles and create lasting memories.

events.name: Prom Night
events.description: Laugh out loud at our Comedy Night. Enjoy hilarious stand-up performances and comedic acts that will tickle your funny bone.

name: Formal Events
description: Delve into the world of technology and innovation. Stay updated on the latest technical advancements, gadgets, and trends that shape our digital future.

events.name: Synocubix
events.description: Witness the marvels of robotics in our Robotics Showcase. Explore cutting-edge robotic technologies and their applications in various industries.
